properties.title: Central Park
properties.description: A large urban park in New York City

properties.title: Golden Gate Park
properties.description: A large park in San Francisco known for its gardens, museums, and recreational facilities

properties.title: Yosemite National Park
properties.description: A national park in California's Sierra Nevada mountains, famed for its granite cliffs, waterfalls, and biodiversity

properties.title: Zion National Park
properties.description: A national park in Utah renowned for its steep red cliffs, canyons, and stunning views

properties.title: Yellowstone National Park
properties.description: A national park in Wyoming, Montana, and Idaho, known for its geothermal features, wildlife, and expansive wilderness
